(ROOT
  (S
    (ADVP (RB Unfortunately))
    (NP (PRP they))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (VP (VBN stopped)
        (PP (IN after)
          (NP (CD 48) (NNS years)))))
    (. !)))


advmod(stopped-4, Unfortunately-1)
nsubj(stopped-4, they-2)
aux(stopped-4, have-3)
root(ROOT-0, stopped-4)
prep(stopped-4, after-5)
num(years-7, 48-6)
pobj(after-5, years-7)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP love)
      (S
        (VP (VBG talking)
          (PP (TO to)
            (NP
              (NP
                (NP (NNP Heritage) (NNP Hawkers))
                (PP (IN like)
                  (NP (NNP Uncle) (NNP Loh))))
              (CC and)
              (NP
                (NP (PRP$ his) (NN wife))
                (SBAR
                  (WHNP (WP who))
                  (S
                    (VP (VBZ runs)
                      (NP
                        (NP (DT a) (JJ little) (NN stall))
                        (VP (VBG selling)
                          (NP
                            (NP (NNP Hokkien) (NNP Mee))
                            (PP (IN in)
                              (NP (NNP East) (NNP Coast) (NNP Lagoon) (NNP Food) (NNP Centre)))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

root(ROOT-0, love-2)
xcomp(love-2, talking-3)
prep(talking-3, to-4)

pobj(to-4, Hawkers-6)
prep(Hawkers-6, like-7)
nn(Loh-9, Uncle-8)
pobj(like-7, Loh-9)
cc(Hawkers-6, and-10)
poss(wife-12, his-11)
conj(Hawkers-6, wife-12)
nsubj(runs-14, who-13)
rcmod(wife-12, runs-14)
det(stall-17, a-15)
amod(stall-17, little-16)
dobj(runs-14, stall-17)
partmod(stall-17, selling-18)
nn(Mee-20, Hokkien-19)
dobj(selling-18, Mee-20)
prep(Mee-20, in-21)
nn(Centre-26, East-22)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Uncle))
    (VP (VBZ has)
      (VP (VBN been)
        (VP (VBG frying)
          (NP (NNP Hokkien) (NNP Mee))
          (SBAR (IN since)
            (S
              (NP (PRP he))
              (VP (VBD was)
                (ADJP
                  (NP (CD 15) (NNS years))
                  (JJ old)
                  (PP
                    (ADVP (RB back))
                    (IN in)
                    (NP (CD 1958))))
                (SBAR
                  (WHADVP (WRB where))
                  (S
                    (NP (PRP he))
                    (VP (VBD worked)
                      (PP (IN as)
                        (NP
                          (NP (DT an) (NN apprentice))
                          (PP (IN for)
                            (NP
                              (NP (NNP Hokkien) (NNP Mee) (NNP Hawker))

                                (WHNP (WP who))

                                          (NP (NNP Hokkien) (NNP Mee))

                                              (NP (DT a) (NN pushcart))

                                                (NP (CD 1940))))))))))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (FRAG (CC or)
    (ADVP
      (ADVP (IN at) (JJS least))
      (SBAR
        (WHNP (WDT that))
        (S
          (VP (VBZ is)
            (SBAR
              (WHADVP (WRB how) (RB long))
              (S
                (NP (PRP he))
                (VP (VBD took)
                  (SBAR (IN before)
                    (S
                      (NP (PRP he))
                      (VP (VBD struck)
                        (PRT (RP out))
                        (PP (IN with)
                          (NP
                            (NP (PRP$ his) (JJ own) (NN pushcart))
                            (PP (IN along)
                              (NP (DT the) (NNP Tanjung) (NNP Rhu) (NN area)))))
                        (PP (IN in)
                          (NP (CD 1963))))))))))))
      (. .))))

    (S
      (S
        (NP (NNP Uncle))
        (VP (VBZ is)
          (ADVP (RB already))
          (PP (IN past)
            (NP (CD 70)))))
      (CC but)

        (NP (PRP he))
        (VP (VBZ is)
          (ADVP (RB still)))))
    (VP (VBZ spends)
      (NP
        (NP (JJS most))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (PRP$ his) (NN time))))
      (PP (IN at)
        (NP (DT the) (NN stall) (NN frying))))
    (NP (NNP Hokkien) (NNP Mee))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (NNP Aunty))
      (ADVP (RB still))
      (VP (VBZ goes)
        (PP (IN about)
          (NP
            (NP (PRP$ her) (NN work))
            (PP (IN of)
              (S
                (VP (VBG taking)
                  (NP (NNS orders))
                  (PP (IN with)
                    (NP
                      (NP (DT a) (JJ big) (NN smile))
                      (PP (IN on)
                        (NP (PRP$ her) (NN face))))))))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (PRP$ her) (NNS eyes))
      (VP (MD will)
        (VP (VB light)
          (PRT (RP up))
          (SBAR
            (WHADVP (WRB when))
            (S
              (NP (PRP she))
              (VP (VBZ talks)
                (PP (IN about)
                  (NP
                    (NP (PRP$ her) (NN son))
                    (SBAR
                      (WHNP (WP who))
                      (S
                        (VP (VBZ is)
                          (VP (VBG working)
                            (PP (IN in)
                              (NP (DT the) (NNP EDB)))
                            (PP (IN as)
                              (NP
                                (NP (CD one))
                                (PP (IN of)
                                  (NP (PRP$ their) (NNS Directors)))))
                            (PP (VBN based)
                              (PP (IN in)
                                (NP (DT the) (NNP US))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (VBZ does) (RB n't)
      (VP (VB sound)
        (SBAR (IN like)
          (S
            (NP (EX there))
            (VP (VBZ is)
              (VP (VBG going)
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB be)
                      (NP (NN anyone))
                      (S
                        (VP (TO to)
                          (VP (VB take)
                            (PRT (RP over))
                            (NP (DT the) (NN stall)))))
                      (SBAR (IN once)
                        (S
                          (NP (NNP Uncle))
                          (VP (VBZ decides)
                            (S
                              (VP (TO to)
                                (VP (VB retire))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

  (S (IN so)
    (NP (DT the) (NN bee) (NN hoon))

        (NP (PDT all) (DT the) (NN prawn) (NN stock)))

      (VP (VBZ is)
        (ADJP (RB especially) (JJ tasty)

            (WHADVP (WRB when))

              (VP (VBP are)

    (. .)))

    (PP (IN Actually))

  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT this) (NN type))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP (NNP Hokkien) (NNP Mee))))
    (VP (MD should)
      (VP (VB be)
        (VP (VBN called)
          (NP
            (NP (NNP Hokkien) (NNP Bee) (NNP Hoon))
            (SBAR (IN because)
              (S
                (NP (EX there))
                (VP (VBZ is)
                  (ADVP (RBR more))
                  (NP
                    (NP (NNP Bee) (NNP Hoon))
                    (PP (IN than)
                      (NP (NNP Mee)))))))))))
    (. !)))


det(type-2, this-1)
nsubjpass(called-8, type-2)
prep(type-2, of-3)
nn(Mee-5, Hokkien-4)
pobj(of-3, Mee-5)
aux(called-8, should-6)
auxpass(called-8, be-7)
root(ROOT-0, called-8)
nn(Hoon-11, Hokkien-9)
nn(Hoon-11, Bee-10)
dobj(called-8, Hoon-11)
mark(is-14, because-12)
expl(is-14, there-13)
dep(Hoon-11, is-14)
advmod(is-14, more-15)
nn(Hoon-17, Bee-16)
nsubj(is-14, Hoon-17)
prep(Hoon-17, than-18)
pobj(than-18, Mee-19)

    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (VP (VBN eaten)
        (PP (IN at)
          (NP (DT this) (NN stall)))
        (NP (JJ several) (NNS times))))
    (, ,)))

    (NP (PRP I))
    (ADVP (RB never))
    (VP
      (ADVP (RB really))
      (VBD took)
      (NP (JJ much) (NN notice))
      (PP (IN until)
        (NP (DT this) (NN occasion))))
    (. .)))

    (NP
      (NP (DT The) (NNS noodles))

        (S
          (NP (PRP I))
          (VP (VBD had)
            (NP (DT this) (JJ particular) (NN night))))))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (ADJP
        (ADJP (RB exceptionally) (JJ tasty))
        (CC and)
        (ADJP (RB well) (JJ fried))))
    (. .)))

    (NP (NNP Uncle))

        (CC and)
        (JJ managed))

        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB give)

      (S
        (NP (PRP they))
        (VP (VBP are)
          (ADVP (RB actually))
          (NP
            (NP (JJ excellent) (NN value))
            (PP (IN as)
              (NP (RB even) (DT the) (NN $)))))))))

    (. .)))

      (VP (VB be)

          (PP (IN in)
            (NP (PRP$ your) (JJ eat) (NN list))))))
    (. !)))

  (S
    (NP (NNP Sheng) (NNP Hokkien) (NNP Mee) (NNP East) (NNP Coast) (NNP Lagoon) (NNP Food) (NNP Centre) (NNP Open) (CD 12))
    (VP (VBP am)

        (NP (JJ 12pm) (NNP View) (NNP Larger) (NNP Map))))))
